about_the_game:
"Zombie Must Dead!" is a game that combines tower defense and FPS elements. Players must continuously fend off waves of zombies, upgrade their weapons, and strive to survive as long as possible.

The demo version includes only one map, while the full version will have three or more. In the demo, players cannot choose a class, but the full version will offer over five classes to choose from.

Plot Summary

A sudden virus outbreak has swept across the globe, and you must rely on your weapons to survive.

Game Features

12 unique weapons available for purchase.

Multiple turrets add tower defense enjoyment, allowing players to enjoy the game even if their shooting skills aren't top-notch.

Intense horror atmosphere.

Boost stats by using special beverages.

Out-of-battle upgrades allow players to enhance attributes at the end of each round.
